#Load Data
```{r}
andrewdata<-read.csv("/Users/Miranda/Documents/Education/UC Santa Cruz/Dittrichia/Dittrichia_Analysis/data/community_survey/community_survey.csv",stringsAsFactors=T)
str(andrewdata) #Check that each column has the right class (factor, integer, numeric, etc.)
andrewdata$Site<-as.character(andrewdata$Site)
andrewdata$Habitat<-factor(andrewdata$Habitat,
                         levels=c("Roadside","Vegetated")) #Changing the contrast order so that everything is compared to Grassland (control)
```
